concept.title: Configurations on NCC for integration with NetAct

conbody.p: This chapter describes how to configure NCC for integration with NetAct post instantiation of NCC. NCC alarms and performance measurements can be integrated with NetAct using SNMP and SFTP connections. This chapter also provides instruction to change the IANA number for NetAct support.
The performance measurements configuration described in this chapter must be applied to all the NCC ME and SM sites.
